CheckTitle: Checks if S3 buckets have replication rules enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an S3 bucket does not have a replication rule or has a replication rule that is not enabled.
Description: Checks if S3 buckets have replication rules enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an S3 bucket does not have a replication rule or has a replication rule that is not enabled.
Risk: Enabling S3 bucket replication enhances data durability and availability but increases costs, complexity, and security risks, necessitating robust management and monitoring practices.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that S3 buckets have replication rules enabled
